description: T.3 Holm Oak - Crown lift to 3.5m from ground level.T.12 Oak - 4m Holistic crown reduction to previous points & deadwood.T.17 Oak - Deadwood only.T.18 Lime - Fell.T.22 Yew - Crown lift to 5m from ground level over access drive. T.23 Yew - Crown lift to 5m from ground level over access drive.
